privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy explains how information collected through dronetech.com.tr (hereinafter referred to as "Platform") operated by DRONETECH will be used, shared, and protected. Please read this policy carefully.

section1.title: 1. Collected Information
section1.text: The Platform aims to minimize the collection of user information. However, the following types of information may be automatically collected during access to the Platform:

sub1.title: 1.1. Personal Information:
sub1.text: Personal details such as your name, email address, and phone number may be collected to communicate with you or provide services on the Platform.

sub2.title: 1.2. Usage Information:
sub2.text: Data such as your interactions on the Platform, visited pages, and duration of use may be automatically recorded. This information is used to improve user experience, optimize services, and ensure security.

sub1.title: 2.1. Service Provision:
sub1.text: Collected information may be used to provide services on the Platform, respond to user requests, and resolve issues.

sub2.title: 2.2. Communication:
sub2.text: Collected contact information may be used to communicate with users; send updates, notifications, or marketing materials.

sub3.title: 2.3. Sharing with Third Parties:
sub3.text: The Platform will not share, sell, or rent user information to third parties. However, the right to provide information to authorized authorities in accordance with legal requirements is reserved.

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section3.text: The Platform aims to improve user experience using cookies and similar technologies. Users can manage or reject cookies through browser settings.

section4.title: 4. Security
section4.text: The Platform undertakes to take appropriate security measures to keep collected information safe. However, communication over the internet or data storage always carries risk, and complete security cannot be guaranteed.

section5.title: 5. Privacy Policy Updates
section5.text: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. It is the user's responsibility to follow updates. Significant changes will be notified to users.

privacy.contact_intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.
